patthana13.5:1.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati
patthana13.5:1.1_1: hetupaccayā. Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo
patthana13.5:1.1_2: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko
patthana13.5:1.1_3: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko
patthana13.5:1.1_4: ca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ
patthana13.5:1.1_5: dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā
patthana13.5:2.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati
patthana13.5:2.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko
patthana13.5:2.1_3: ca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:3.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati
patthana13.5:3.1_1: hetupaccayā. Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo
patthana13.5:3.1_2: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko
patthana13.5:3.1_3: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko
patthana13.5:3.1_4: ca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ
patthana13.5:3.1_5: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:4.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikañca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana13.5:5.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikañca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana13.5:6.1_0: Hetuyā ekūnavīsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke ekādasa …pe… avigate ekūnavīsa. (Sahajātavārampi
patthana13.5:7.1_0: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe pannarasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa, anantare soḷasa …pe… sahajāte
patthana13.5:7.1_1: ekūnavīsa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye chabbīsa, upanissaye sattarasa, purejāte cha,
patthana13.5:7.1_2: pacchājāte nava, āsevane aṭṭha, kamme terasa, vipāke aṭṭha, āhāre terasa …pe… magge
patthana13.5:7.1_3: terasa, sampayutte nava, vippayutte dvādasa …pe… avigate chabbīsa.
